metadata.name: Wielding Warthogs #1
metadata.description: Warthogs NFT is a FREE mint project consisting of 2,222 GENESIS collection. It will be the first of three PFP collections, which are Warthogs, followed by Blacksmiths and finally Engineers. All will be tied up to the MMORPG game end point. Ultimately, the team would be building an MMORPG game based on the lore. The roadmap consists of episodes. Each of the episode represents progression into the Lore of WarthogsNFT with episode 5 and beyond as the culmination of all the episodes combined. The project includes staking your Warthog NFT to generate Warthog tokens. The project will be building a gamified marketplace which will utilize our token as the currency. Whitelists as well as basic elements will be sold. The gamification of the marketplace involves CRAFTING. Not much can be said for now on this regard as we think this will be the first of its kind in the space. Finally, the MMORPG is planned to be an openworld sandbox game
